title: Toastmasters font?
content:
Can you ID the font used for Toastmasters International (the blue type) on their home page?  
 [www.toastmasters.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021142826/http:/www.toastmasters.org/ "www.toastmasters.org")  
It looks a bit Trade Gothic but the 'a' is different.  
Any ideas? I await in anticipation!  
Thanks all.
author: David

comments.content: I think it's a bizarrely rendered Helvetica Condensed Bold.

Thanks for that.  
Not sure it's quite a match though - maybe it's Helvetica Neue Condensed Bold?
It looks like the s's are turned upside down.

I thought that was just a signmakers’ thing: putting up upside down s’es. Saw a lot of these in Paris last week…

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
